articles.author: Nikki Nolan
articles.title: Polar vortex set to freeze the U.S. as far as the Deep South - CBS News
articles.description: A deep freeze, thanks to the polar vortex dipping down from Siberia, will bring frigid temperatures to nearly 300 million Americans.
articles.content: With the Northern Hemisphere well into the winter months, it may seem like temperatures are cold enough already. However, a deep freeze, thanks to the polar vortex dipping down from Siberia, is about… [+2675 chars]

articles.author: STEVE PEOPLES, JONATHAN J. COOPER
articles.title: Progressives are frustrated by Biden’s final-days warning of billionaire influence - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Democratic Party's left wing is responding to President Joe Biden's strong words about the possibility of an American oligarchy with a combination of appreciation, bemusement and frustration. For many progressives, Biden's speech was too little and far to…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The Democratic Partys left wing has warned for decades that America is moving toward an oligarchy in which a handful of billionaires controls much of the nations wealth and political po… [+7483 chars]
